name: basic_interview_case
description: case for interviewing of frontend developers

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix project/backend" "npm run dev --prefix project/frontend"
scripts.build: cd project/frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build && cp -r ../frontend/dist ./dist/public
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix project/backend && npm install --prefix project/frontend

author: Eugene Jesovile
